name: TinyTimeSelect

clearable.description: Whether the Clear button is displayed

default-value.description: Optionally, if the selected date value is empty, the default time displayed when the selector panel is opened must be set to a value that can be parsed by new Date().
default-value.description_zh: 可选，当选中的日期值为空时，选择器面板打开时默认显示的时间，需设置为可被new Date()解析的值

disabled.description: Whether the time selector is disabled

editable.description: Whether the text box can be entered manually
editable.description_zh: 文本框是否可手动输入

v-model.description: Date value selected by the date picker to set the initial value of the selector
v-model.description_zh: 日期选择器选中的日期值，可设置选择器的初始值

:picker-options.description: Refer to the following table for options specific to the current time and date selector
:picker-options.description_zh: 当前时间日期选择器特有的选项参考下表

placeholder.description: Input the content of the prompt placeholder
placeholder.description_zh: 输入框的提示占位内容

popper-append-to-body.description: Whether to insert a popover into the body element. If there is a problem with the positioning of the popover, you can set this property to false
popper-append-to-body.description_zh: 是否将弹出框插入至 body 元素。在弹出框的定位出现问题时，可将该属性设置为 false

popper-class.description: TimePicker 下拉框的 class 类名
popper-class.description_zh: TimePicker 下拉框的 class 类名

size.description: 输入框尺寸; 该属性的可选值为 medium、small、mini
size.description_zh: 输入框尺寸; 该属性的可选值为 medium、small、mini

events.name: blur
events.description_zh: 当 input 失去焦点时触发

events.name: change
events.description: Triggers when the value of the input binding changes
events.description_zh: 当 input 绑定的值发生改变时触发

events.name: focus
events.description_zh: 当 input 获得焦点时触发

description: 时间选择框是下拉框的特例，按时分格式（不支持自定义格式）展示下拉列表以供用户选择，并能扩展下拉框部分参数。
description_zh: 时间选择框是下拉框的特例，按时分格式（不支持自定义格式）展示下拉列表以供用户选择，并能扩展下拉框部分参数。
